name: Friendly Fire v1 - Alpha
description:
STILL UNDER CONSTRUCTION

This was a joint project between myself, Kit Gardner, Stephen Gazaway, and some assistance from Nicholas Bileci, though he no longer works on the project.

The game is a fast paced fighting game still in its infant stages. Play as one of four characters and take the fight to the enemy, or go online and battle your friends in a free for all!

Donations are not required, but are appreciated. All proceeds will go to funding additional updates to the game.
